post.author: 김태희
post.content:
Length: To be defined
Respond By: April 19, 2010
Deliverables:
`````````````
* Deliverables required all of the stated mandatory experience;
* Fuller details will be published when available.

Skills Required:

Mandatory:
``````````
* Functional expertise in implementing Oracle ERP Financials and I-Expense, HRMS, OLM, and Payroll modules;
* Minimum 6 years Oracle ERP 11i;
* Minimum 1 year Version R12;
* Experience in Migrating ERP11i to Release 12i;
* Familiarity with Human Resources, Finance and Payroll general policies and procedures in an unionized environment.
Other:

How To Respond:
````````````````
A). Email reponse directly to hr@tlwenterprise.com;
B). Provide your resume in Word (It will only be presented with your permission);
C). Quote "Re: Oracle Application Specialist, Contract, Toronto, ON, Posting # 1" on the Subject Line;
D). Provide three work references with contact info for submission to the client;
E). Please help us to know your work experience better by answering the following questions in your reply:
1. Please specify the number of years of experience for the following:
a) IT environment (including b below)?
b) Oracle Application Specialist?
c) When were the most recent month and year you worked as an Oracle Application Specialist?

and as an Oracle Application Specialist with:
(Please specify both "years of experience" & "when was the last used")

d) Functional expertise in implementing Oracle ERP Financials and I-Expense, HRMS, OLM, and Payroll modules?
e) ERP 11i?
f) Version R12?
g) Migrating ERP11i to Release 12i?
h) Human Resources, Finance and Payroll general policies and procedures in an unionized environment?

2. When are you available to start?

3. Are you incorporated, registered partnership, sole proprietorship or individual?

4. What is your expected hourly rate?
------------------------------
Selected candidates will be contacted.

Job Type:

Contract
Position URL:

http://www.tlwenterprise.com
post.title: Oracle Application Specialist
